data.actual_result: On long pressing, the text goes invisible as the highlight moves onto it.
data.expected_result: The text is in a colour that can be seen.
data.short_description: When you send a friend request to someone using the nearby feature and long press on the person's name, the sent text goes completely invisible. [Light theme only].
data.steps_to_repro: - Switch to light theme (I should not be telling this. You should already be using it). - Open nearby friends and start the Bluetooth search and have a friend with you do the same thing. - Send the person a friend request (tell them not to accept). - Long press on the person's username and observe the sent text.
